summary: This mod changes the moon Masser to Mr. Popo.
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys. I was procrastinating today, so I made this little mod to scare the residents of Skyrim. Please message me if you have any problems with the mod, and if you like it, please endorse it! Have fun with your now-terrifying Skyrim nights!


[u]Credits:

[/u]TeamFourStar for inspiring this mod ([url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V06DISKajss]Link[/url]ï»¿) Also I used the exact Popo moon in that video.
Akira Toriyama for making the Mr. Popo we all know and love
author: PatrickTheElephant
